title: Koe no Chiisai Komori-san to Kusodeka Oogoe no Oobayashi-kun
original_name: 声の小さい小森さんとクソデカ大声の大林くん
sinopse:
Komori is complexed about her soft and quiet voice, which is the complete opposite of Oobayashi, who always speaks in a loud and rowdy voice. But although their volume contrast each other, their feelings are mutual. Will they ever be able to communicate to each other?

(Source: Kadokawa, translated)
